price: 15. ¡Por supuesto que será (resucitado y) juzgado! Su Señor lo estaba observando.
arabic: بَلَىٰٓۚ إِنَّ رَبَّهُۥ كَانَ بِهِۦ بَصِيرٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: balā inna rabbahu kāna bihi baṣīran
